channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2 new very deep pot holes appeared next to one that was repaired, 20th January
item.description:
Towards island driving towards sandy Road about 100 yards up- you canâ€™t miss it because a large pot hole was filled in about a week ago but the smaller ones that were left at that time right next to it have opened up into a really deep hole. This whole road is dangerous for cyclist's and cars
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stockton Close Strobe Light, 20th January
item.description:
There is a flickering street light outside number 3 and number 5 Stockton Close. The previous report was marked as fixed but it is still flickering and is causing a strobe effect in our house.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Stockton Close, Cheltenham
